name: Truth Zone
description:
Description

Truth zone is our second game and a compo for LD29, so i just dug out this game from my hard drive and there it is. It was made on Unity 4.5 (a while ago)

It is Halloween, and smart aliens decide to invade Earth. They go unseen as people think they are disguised, but not be our hero.

He uses the truth zones which makes the real alien glowing with a green light and fry them with his lser. But be carefull, you don"t want to fry real humans !

How To

xbox controller for the win !

  • Left joystick for direction
  • A to jump
  • X to shoot
The Authors

Assets made by : The kinograph

Code and Unity Integration : Marc GIraud-telmeFinal Word

Well there are many problems in this game, here is a not exhaustive list

  • The window is cropped on the side and the Gui is misplaced
  • The player jumps a bit to high
  • The font is rubbish
  • Cam is not smooth
  • ...

Anyway doing a first LD was a great experience.

We made this a game the year before I joined the 42 computing scool in Paris, so if you check the source code, please don't be too hard on me :p
